title: What does the fromRandom() method do?
text: What does the method bsv.HDPrivateKey.fromRandom() do in the #bsvlibrary? #javascript #bsv

answers.text: The fromRandom() method uses a pretty good random number generator to salt the creation of a PrivateKey object, which you can then derive an address from etc.

payment.message: Thanks! This was a very helpful answer.

answers.text: I have no idea but would you like to buy my cereal?
